startAdventure.title: {{lessonTitle}} Adventure
startAdventure.message: Ready to start your pronunciation practice?

summaries.lessons.letterA: Master the mighty 'A' sound! Learn how to make this amazing letter with perfect pronunciation.
summaries.lessons.letterB: Bounce into the 'B' sound! Discover the lip-popping technique for perfect pronunciation.
summaries.lessons.letterC: Catch the 'C' sound! Learn the crisp consonant that starts so many words.
summaries.lessons.letterD: Dive into the 'D' sound! Master the tongue-tip technique for this dynamic letter.
summaries.lessons.letterE: Explore the 'E' sound! Practice the essential vowel that appears everywhere.
summaries.lessons.letterF: Feel the 'F' sound! Learn the fantastic fricative with lip-to-teeth contact.
summaries.lessons.letterG: Get the 'G' sound! Master the great consonant with back-of-tongue placement.
summaries.lessons.letterH: Hear the 'H' sound! Practice the heavenly breath sound that starts so many words.
summaries.lessons.letterI: Investigate the 'I' sound! Learn the important vowel with its short and long forms.
summaries.lessons.letterJ: Jump into the 'J' sound! Master the joyful consonant with tongue placement.
summaries.lessons.week1Boss: Boss Challenge! Test all your Week 1 consonant and vowel skills in epic sound battles!
summaries.lessons.week2Boss: Ultimate Boss Battle! Show mastery of all sounds learned in an exciting final challenge!

forum.privateHint: Only you and the REACH can view this.
forum.title: Title

instructions.task1: Practice the sounds of letter A, B, and C. Record yourself pronouncing them and get instant feedback. Try as many times as you like to get it right.
instructions.task2: Find words starting with D, E, and F. Write them down and practice their sounds.
instructions.task3: Record yourself saying the words starting with G, H, and I and get instant feedback. Try as many times as you like to get it right.
instructions.task4: Complete the final challenge by recording yourself saying words starting with J, K, and L. Get feedback and see how many Dino Energy you can earn!
instructions.task5: Record yourself saying the sounds M, N, and O, and compare your pronunciation. Try as many times as you like to get it right.
instructions.task6: Practice the sounds of P, Q, and R. Record yourself pronouncing them and get instant feedback. Try as many times as you like to get it right.
